@name	Mac OS Hebrew
@alias	MacHebrew
@charset	x-mac-hebrew
@cfstringencoding	5
@codepage	10005

@filename-txt	VENDORS/APPLE/HEBREW.TXT
@verify-against	http://www.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/APPLE/HEBREW.TXT

@cite-title	Map (external version) from Mac OS Hebrew character set to Unicode 2.1 and later.

@cite-date	5 Apr 2005
